LanguageData.KeshigFactionGreetingHostile: {0} growls and scolds you in some unknown language and disconnects.
LanguageData.KeshigFactionGreetingHostileAppreciative: Breathing heavily, muttering some swears in an unknown language, {0} commands that you will make a gesture of camaraderie, like bringing gifts to one of {0_possessive} settlements or releasing {0_possessive} faction's prisoners unharmed. Until then, {0_pronoun} is unwilling to talk.\n\nTaking a swig of {0_possessive} drink, {0_pronoun} disconnects.
LanguageData.KeshigFactionGreetingWary: {0} roars a salute to {NEGOTIATOR_labelShort} and asks what you need taken care of.
LanguageData.KeshigFactionGreetingWarm: Chanting cheerfully, {0} greets {NEGOTIATOR_labelShort} with a slurred voice, and asks what {LEADER_pronoun} can do to aid you.
LanguageData.KeshigMilitaryAidSent: {0} accepts the request for keshig units, and says they'll arrive immediately.
